description: This source file contains PHP functions and variables related to JWT token verification, including signature validation, token data validation, key handling, and logging. It supports JWT processing for authentication purposes in a web UI context.

methods.name: VerifyToken
methods.description: Verifies a JWT token by checking its structure, signature, and data validity.

methods.name: VerifySignature
methods.description: Verifies the cryptographic signature of the JWT token using the public key.

methods.name: CheckModTimeValid
methods.description: Checks if the modification time of the key file is within the acceptable window (4 hours).

methods.name: VerifyTokenData
methods.description: Validates the token's temporal claims (iat, nbf, exp) and tenant ID.

methods.name: WritePubKey
methods.description: Writes the public key to a certificate file.

methods.name: LogTokenData
methods.description: Logs token information or errors to a log file.
